unnormalised: Borem, konn tax kaido vixim vicharta dista, hã? Kamar kasun gheiat, kiteak hem kitli rokhddich rang poddta tem polleun bhõvta... toxench kitloch korun. Tumchea ajeche soddun kitle ITR bhortat kiteak soddun rupia ₹5000 soddun ghara kelellea lônché vikrentlean mell’lea.
normalised: Barobar, konnak tori tax kaydea vixim prashn asta mhunn dita? Kamar kas baddh, kiteak hem rang sukhtana pollovche bhaxen uttejit aasa... kiteak mhunnge kamui astalem. Tumchea ajjek tumi Income Tax Return dakholl korchek kiteak zata mhunn sangpak sodtana kalpona kara, tumi gharache piklez vikhun fokot panch hazar rupya kamayle torui.

unnormalised: Poilem, Bharotant tax kaido ek vhodda, dubllea jôgôlâ sarkha. Tê ek aunti sarkhi vô chukôlô bhôglea vixim zannam ani tuka sôv’kai soddun dita. Tuja lagim Income Tax Act, GST, zôddleank zôdd jageche vostuche sompôshik tax vôstum tumchea poichêchi bhôgôl vôstup. Hem somzôunk ek kaideo digri vô ôti coffee gheunk zai (hanv dovôrekuch dovôreo ditam).
normalised: Poile vatten, Bharotantlem tax kaydo mhunnje ek vhoddlem, bhonvdik bhut. Hem tem ajem bhaxen aasa jem soglleam vixim sogllem zanna ani tuka thanddi sangata nyay dita. Tumchea kodden tumcho Income Tax Act, G-S-T, tumchea poddem tumchea xezarche ego-poros vhoddli bhum astali zalear, kashtichi taxichi vostu asonvui yeta. Tem samzonk tor ek kaydeachi digri va gambhir caffeinecho vyasan lagta (hanv dusreachi suchovna ditam).

unnormalised: Magir “tax yôznna” vishim soddun zata. Tem fensi dista, khorem nâ? Kiteak tum konnakui vittôllak zanna, bhôglak. Punn khorem mhollear, March 31 vôtum nirbhôr bhôrlear tumchea pãchôllea sôdi ghevnka, tuka dôktôr sôdi gheunka. ELSS fundant dôgôvnuka vô tumchea bhôgêraiche vostukam sôdi ghevnuka... vôstukam tum dêvllat vôstukam, punn vôtum sôdi ghevnuka. Tum sekshon 80C khal rupia ₹1.5 lakh dâvo dônvôruk zata.
normalised: Uprant "tax yojna" chi sogli sankalpna asa. Hem dekhavk bhare lagta, nhe? Tum kinshya arthik jadugar asata mhunn. Punn khorench, tem chodd korun March ektis velear deductions sodtank vaitam, tem sarkarent tumchea pagarachem odhem ditana tumi uprant dukhi zatonam. E-L-S-S funds hantunt guntovunk va tumchea avoi-bapainchem voijki bima bhortok... tumi kortalem te vostu tumi korpak zai, punn deaddline lagim yetana achanakuch bhare urgent lagta. Tumka eka point panch lakh rupya section eighty C khala magpak yeta, tumchea mahite khatir.

unnormalised: Ani tanko tax slab vixim dônvôrucho zôvnâ ghevnkai mhaka ghevnka. Tê Bollywood ektreche kes porvorche dhôktôraiche pãchê kitlech ghôdtat. Ek vêrs tum 5% bracketant astam, punn dusrea vêrs tum rôkhddi 20% dônvôrucho kiteak tum khôlli nôkri gheukacho dôvôrekuch soddun dita. Tê sôppani bhôglea jôgôl sarkha khêle soddun zata, punn sôppani IT depôtômentlean aili taxôdi dhôktôr.
normalised: Ani tax slabancher tumi mhojek suru korunk dium naka. Te bollywood actresses' hairdo poros chodd bodlota. Eka vorsak tumi panch percent bracketant asata, dusrea vorsak tumi achanakuch vis percentant tumi thoddi bori job mellounk dharun yetat. Hem sapan ani nishanni sangata khellachi survat naso zata mhunn asa, punn sogli sanp Income Tax departmentachim tax notice aasa.

unnormalised: Khore utor mhollear TDS (Tax Deducted at Source) samballcho. Khorem mhollear, sôrkar tuka taxôdichi vaitôllak dôkta ani dêvllat dôktôraiche poilem taxôdi dôkta. Têkarun, tum frelânsar zaunk, tumchea vostu rupia Form 16 ani TIN ankôdhuk vôstum gheunk jôdi gheunko. Mhozo CA friend, Adv. Sharma, dôktôraiche dôrun dita. Kitele kiteleo zaunk, bhai!
normalised: Khoreacho kicker mhunnje T-D-S (Tax Deducted at Source) sangata deal korun. Khorench sarkaren tumi tax-dodging villain asata mhunn manta ani soglleank tumka pais diunche adhim tax deduct korpak laita. Tech porim, tum freelancer astali zalear, Form sixteen-s ani T-I-N numberachea samudrantlean vochnastana tumka bhorti ditole. Mhoje C-A dost, Advocate Sharma, sodanch mhaka laksh divpak sangta. Sangpak sope, bhai!

unnormalised: Ani tum hem dôvôrekuch dolla dêta ani tike dôrun dita, magir tum dônvôruk soddun dita. Income Tax Depôtôment tem purvêla boyfriend sarkha jidki taka soddun dita. Tê tuka bhôgnnant, ani dêvllat dôktôraiche dakhôl ditat. Ani tê tuka itli vostu dêvo ditat, tuka vhôdli Maggi ghevnko dôktôr. Bhôgtem vêrs tim 31/07 vêrs bhôrlear, tike soddun dita (tike bhôrlear, kiteak ti amkam dôktôr dêta).
normalised: Ani tumi hem sogllem ignore korpak zata mhunn ani hem pois zatolem mhunn dukhi korunk zata mhunn dukhi kortali zalear, dusream vixim dukhi kor. Income Tax Department mhunnje tumchea ex-boyfriend bhaxen asa jem tumkam ektekuch soddpaak vochonam. Te tumkam melltele. Te sodanch kortat. Ani te tumka itle vhoddle penalties martele, tumi aglichea so mahineanchea timek Maggi khatole. Tech porim tarka bhorti korpak borem, ektis july vea adhim (jekhon te extend korpaak nant, jem te tumka payancher vhorunche khatir sodanch kortat).

unnormalised: Ukrôkuch bhôgtem, tax kaido vôstachem. Hem dêvllat vostukam amkam dôktôr, jêdikuch, hosipitallam, ani kiteak nîva kriket stadium. Têkarun, tike khupir ditat, punn dôktôr ditat. Tum ek bôrem CA bhôgnnant, chai bhôrlear, ani dôktôr ghevnkai. Tuka ôditôdi ditat tumcho ôdôdrupia ₹5000000 ghevnko, dôktôr! Borem tumchea taxam lagun zalam ani tumchea kôlôl (ani dôktôr) dêvllat tumchea favorant!
normalised: Gambhiripan, tax kaydo mhunnje mahatvacho. Hem amkam zai asloleo soglio vostunchi bhorti dita, jem raste, hospitalam, ani tem vhodd cricket stadium asonvui yeta. Tech porim, hem thoddi bhuk asonvui yeta, hem ek bhuk zai. Ek borem C-A sod, chai stock kar, ani tyachi ultti uttejana velear haspak yaad kar. Tumi audit korun zata tumchi aay panch million rupya poros asli zalear, tech porim laksh divnk zai! Tumchea taxes sangata bori bhavna, ani tumchi ichcha (ani deductions) tumchea faideant sodanch asonvui yeta!
